availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Rea (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky farmer. Maryland native. Married to Susan McElvain Rea in Lewis County, Kentucky, on August 27, 1822. Father of George W. Rea, Mary E. Rea, John Rea, Elizabeth Rea, Joseph Rea, Margaret J. Rea, Susan H. Rea, Amanda E. Rea, and Henry C. Rea. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 181B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 804.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film #000344051, p. 60.
